short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display any webite in an exaggerated style of suprematism and material design. You can turn the extension on and off as you please.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: As observed by many and Google itself, material design is inspired by the avant-garde aesthetics of “Suprematism”. Since Android and the Google Chrome browser are both the most widely used software on the web, it can be said that Google not only has a great influence on the look and feel of the WWW, but also an impact in interface design in general. My extension takes material design to its extreme.
